qas.question: What is the name of the novel written by Ibn Tufail?
In what book did Hayy ibn Yaqdhan foreshadow the idea of modern materialism?
What book by Ibn Tufail did not discuss materialism?

context: In early <b1_0><b2_0>12th-century<b2_0/><b1_0/> al-Andalus, the Arabian philosopher, Ibn Tufail (Abubacer), wrote discussions on materialism in his philosophical novel, <a0_0><b4_0>Hayy ibn Yaqdhan<b4_0/> (<b3_0>Philosophus Autodidactus<b3_0/>)<a0_0/>, while vaguely foreshadowing the idea of a historical materialism.
